reviewText: My favorite exercise routine of all time.  Have purchased many others since my first purchase of Freedanse in the early 80's. but I keep coming back to this one.  Wonderful stretching, strengthening moves, then followed by fun and challenging dance moves.  I purchased 2 additional ones years ago in case my original dies, but it's still going.  Wish they'd put on DVD!
I loved this in the 80s and I still do.  Delighted to find it and in great condition.  Had me smiling for days.  Fun, great workout, love the 80s style (complete with legwarmers).

I have had this video for years, but it seems that every time I move, I manage to lose it but it worth buying again and again. This is a good workout video for someone who is NOT looking to slide up and down a dance pole.
